Name: Add optional call to action button on slides
Description: This would allow merchants to add call to action buttons on slides instead of having the whole slide be clickable.

Name: Add options to make sidebar more customizable
Description: Allow merchants to put different sections in the sidebar.

Name: Badges for new items
Description: Add theme settings and styles to support badges to denote new items to a store

Name: Add link display options on minimal layout
Description: Currently there is no alignment options for the minimal header layout. This would allow merchants to choose if their links are left  center or right aligned.

Name: Add option to hide out of stock products from results
Description: If enabled  this would allow merchants to hide out of stock products from the search results page.

Name: Expanded Social Platform Support
Description: Expanded social platform support for merchants to easily link their social profiles to their Shopify e-commerce channel  and toggle icon appearance on their Shopify store.

Name: Add more then one email to contact bar
Description: This would allow merchants to show more than one email address in the contact bar incase they have multiple address for shoppers to reach them at for different reasons.

Name: Add option to show out of stock variants on product page
Description: This would allow merchants to show out of stock variants on product pages as well as give them the option to let shoppers select them out of stock variants for use with apps.

Name: Add Alternate template for preorders
Description: Add a template or set of features that allow merchants to set up pre-order pages.

Name: Allow multiple feature posts
Description: Currently only one post can be featured  but in some cases it would makes sense for merchants to be able to select multiple featured posts.

Name: Add option to display number of variants
Description: This would allow merchants to show some indicatory of how many variants exist for a product.

Name: Show inventory levels
Description: Add options to the theme editor to allow inventory to be displayed throughout the theme  including the option to show inventory differently when stock is getting low.

Name: Option to hide certain categories from search results
Description: This would allow merchants to exclude certain products from search results. Could be helpful if there are particular collections that are only available to certain shoppers.

Name: Adding 'show vendor title' and 'align height of product images' to customizer
Description: In the Product Page customizer tab  it would be great to have 'Align height of product images' and "Show vendor" as options in the theme customizer.A customer sent me these screenshots of the options in another theme:"Align height" option turned off: http://files.pxu.co/0h123c1J2b3q"Align height" option turned on: http://files.pxu.co/2D0Z0A2j061SLooks like the 'align height' zooms in on the product image in order to align the product titles and info. Would be great to have this in our themes!

Name: Unit Pricing
Description: Merchants selling in France and Germany are required to show unit prices for certain types of products to be compliant with the law. Ex: €9.99 / 100g. Unit prices make it easy for buyers to compare prices.

Name: Add option for featured blog post
Description: Allow merchants to select one or more blog posts as a featured blog post on the blog index page.

Name: Add option to make add-to-cart confirmation smaller
Description: This would allow merchants to choose a size for the add to cart confirmation.

Name: Add option for bottom bar on mobile-only
Description: This would allow merchants to choose to only have the bottom bar menu on mobile only  rather than having it on both mobile and desktop.

Name: Add text size options to announcement bar
Description: Allow merchants to choose how large or small the text in the announcement bar is.

Name: Add image to mega menu
Description: Mega menu's are the large menus that display multiple categories and their children at once. Allowing images to be added to the mega menu can help add context or provide a space for promotions/up-selling.

Name: Add setting to display the number of results for each filter in the sidebar
Description: This would allow merchants to choose if they want to show how many products are related to each filter in the sidebar.

Name: Add option for RTL language compatibility
Description: This would allow the store content to be displayed Right to Left to accommodate those languages that are read from right to left.

Name: Collection name placement options
Description: This option would allow merchants to decide where the collection name is shown on the collection list page.

Name: Option to add social icons to header
Description: The means social icons could be in the header instead of just in the footer

Name: Add options to choose row + column number
Description: On the collection list page  currently there is no way to change the number of rows or columns that are shown, adding this option could mean consistency is easier to achieve across the theme.

Name: Add option for collection information placement to change like product information placement.
Description: This would add an option to allow merchants to choose to have the collection titles below the collection image on the collection list page.

Name: Support more video service embed options
Description: This would allow merchants to add videos that are not hosted on Youtube.

Name: Make recently viewed it's own page
Description: This would create a page where shoppers could see all their recently view products on a page  not just the 4 most recent that they currently see.

Name: Increase options  esp. background image
Description: This would make the password page more customizable

Name: Add option for sticky/fixed header on mobile
Description: This would allow the header to be sticky on mobile and on desktop if enabled.

Name: Free shipping available tags
Description: Make it so merchants can choose a certain tag to apply to their products that allows them to denote products that are eligible for free shipping.

Name: Add Font size control options
Description: This would add options to control the size of the fonts used on the theme globally without having to write any CSS.

Name: Add option to have sidebar menus collapsed by default
Description: Sidebar menus can get long  this option would allow merchants to choose to have them collapsed to start and allow shoppers to expand them when they want.

Name: Add option to have social media icons in header
Description: Allow merchants to have social media links in the header

Name: Add optional phone number field to contact form
Description: Allow shoppers to contact you via phone if you'd like them to be able to do so.

Name: Add Qty selection display options
Description: This would allow merchants to choose if they have an input for quantity selection or use a dropdown.

Name: Add option to remove text on collection list section of homepage
Description: This feature would allow merchants to choose if they want to show text or not on the collection list section on the homepage.

Name: Swatches
Description: Add the ability to display color variants as swatches throughout the theme.

Name: Add option for image in Promo block
Description: This option would allow merchants to choose an image to add to the promotion block on the collection page.

Name: Add option for slides dots to slideshow
Description: This would allow merchants to choose if they want to have dots for each slide in a slideshow to help shoppers navigate through slideshow content.

Name: Add option for second button on slideshows
Description: This would allow merchants to have two call to actions on one slideshow image.

Name: Add option to hide sold out variants
Description: This option would allow merchants to hide sold out options on the product page so shoppers never see them.

Name: Ability to hide out of stock variants
Description: When a product has out of stock variants currently they display in the product variants lists  but are greyed out. This would add an option to allow merchants to control the visibility of out of stock variants.

Name: Customizable quick shop display
Description: The would add options to the theme editor where merchants could choose what information they want to show in the quick shop  vendor, sku, etc. and if they want to truncate the product description or show the whole thing.

Name: Add Pre-order functionality to product
Description: This would be achieved through theme settings or through an alternate product template

Name: Add option to allow sidebar to persist across entire theme
Description: This would give merchants the option to show the sidebar on all pages  or on just some pages.

Name: Pre-order available labels
Description: This would create a method using tags to indicate if a product is available for pre-order and label the product as such on the store front.

Name: Add option to show vendor on cart items
Description: This would allow merchants to choose if they want to show the vendor of each product on the cart page.

Name: Unit Pricing
Description: Merchants selling in France and Germany are required to show unit prices for certain types of products to be compliant with the law. Ex: €9.99 / 100g. Unit prices make it easy for buyers to compare prices.

Name: Add option to add images in Meganav
Description: This would allow merchants to add images in the meganav that could be used to represent the collection  or for use as a promotion section.

Name: Add option to disable product zoom
Description: This would allow merchants to choose whether or not there is zoom available on their product images

Name: Add promo section option to sidebar
Description: This would allow merchants to input promotional images  text and links into the sidebar.

Name: Allow  goal feature per variant
Description: This would expand the goal feature to be able to be used an a variant basis  not just a product basis.

Name: Add option to hide out of stock variants on product page
Description: This would allow merchants to make out of stock variants hidden so shoppers never see them.

Name: Add option to control products per row
Description: This would allow merchant to choose how many products are in a row

Name: Add option for address/contact block in footer
Description: Add the option for merchants to share address/contact information in the footer if they choose.

Name: Clickable top parent in Navigation
Description: Allow the top navigation item to be clickable  not just a trigger to open the dropdown.

Name: Add option to show product info all the time
Description: This option would allow shoppers to see the product name  price and savings without having to hover over the product on the collection page.

Name: Add option for Previous/Next bottom on product pages to navigate
Description: This option when enabled by the merchant would let shoppers browse all products in a collection without having to return to the collection page.

Name: Inventory display
Description: Allow shoppers to see inventory numbers

Name: Add option to make cart icon link to cart page
Description: Adding this as an option would allow merchants to choose if shoppers see the mini-cart when they click the cart icon or be taken directly to the cart page.

Name: Add layout options for header/navigation
Description: Add options to allow the logo and/or the menu to be displayed in different locations on the header.

Name: Add option to make product details "sticky"
Description: This would allow merchants to choose if the products details stick in the shoppers view when scrolling through the product images.

Name: Ability to select out of stock variants
Description: When viewing products with out of stock variants currently  the variants that are sold out cannot be selected. This would add an option to the theme editor so merchants could choose if sold out variants are able to be selected for use with back in stock notification apps.

Name: Add hot-spots to featured Poduct hot- section
Description: Ability to place a dot on the image of the featured product and add information about the product for specific components.

Name: Add display options for out of stock products in live search
Description: Some merchants want to show out of stock options  some do not. Adding an option for the visibility of out of stock options means people could show what they want.

Name: Add option for infinite scrolling on collection pages
Description: Allow collections that are multiple pages long to be scrolled through without having to click a link to go to the next page.

Name: Add option for content layout
Description: This would add additional options fro how product content is laid out on the product pages.

Name: Product inventory display
Description: Add the option to display stock on product pages  including low stock information.

Name: Make lightbox a slideshow
Description: Change how when products are viewed in the zoom lightbox from only being able to view one at a time  to viewing all available images be visible as a slideshow.

Name: Add link style options in the alternating content blocks
Description: This means merchants could make the links look like buttons instead of just links if they wanted.

Name: Add option to display product images per variant
Description: This would allow merchants to show each variants images when the variant is selected rather then showing all the images for the product at once.

Name: Add option to hide vendor
Description: This would allow merchants to hide the vendor on the collection page.

Name: Add URL to featured collection section
Description: To allow shoppers to more easily view the entire featured collection  allow a URL to be added to the section heading.

Name: Add collection filters
Description: Collection filters allow shoppers to narrow what they are looking for in a collection by predefined parameters that make sense for the shop. Adding them to the collection pages of Atlantic could improve the usability of the shops using it.

Name: Add option to allow out of stock variants to be selected
Description: This option would allow shoppers to select out of stock options. This could allow them to interact with back in stock notifications if the merchant has one set up.

Name: Add option to hide calculate shipping button
Description: This option would allow merchants to hide the calculate shipping button on the cart page  because sometimes it's just not needed.
